name: Desert Strider
description:
Make your way through the dangerous desert, tend to the machinery, and remember that if the temperature goes well above zero, it is as dangerous as below.

Disclaimer: the game was made for Epic Game Jam - 2022

Your goal is to move from one Trade Checkpoint to another to deliver goods.

For that, you have your big vehicle called Desert Strider. It's huge. 

[Mouse wheel] To zoom into it and zoom out.
[W][S][A][D] - to control your character.
[E] Use Terminals
[Mouse][LMB] - aim and shoot
Hold [LAlt] - to highlight active areas inside the Strider.

The main point of controlling the machine is to control Heat. If it is too low - you're dead. If it's too high - you're dead. Balance - is key.

Almost everything produces heat, Fortunately, we have a Cooling system that allows you to sink heat from time to time.

The engine produces Steam and Energy that feeds all other systems, such as motion, turret, lights, etc.

Fuel - is the life of the machine's engine. Don't forget to throw it in the furnace. More fuel produces more energy and more heat. Also, you can pick up Fuel while the machine is walking.

Pay attention to indicators on the dashboard.
